document.docAuthor: Glowska, Eliza, Chrzanowski, Mateusz & Kaszewska, Katarzyna
document.masterDocTitle: Checklist of the Quill mites (Acariformes: Syringophilidae) of the World

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Checklist of the Quill mites (Acariformes: Syringophilidae) of the World

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Picobia
Haller, 1878
: 93
. Type-species:
Picobia heeri Haller
, by monotypy.

biarmicus
Skoracki, Bochkov and Wauthy, 2004
: 165
, figs. 28–36 .
Type material.
Holotype female at AMU (S-68.1.1.), paratypes : female, males at AMU . Hosts and distribution.
Panurus biarmicus
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Panuridae ), type-locality: POLAND , Miedzyodrze (
Skoracki et al. 2004 d
).

brotogeris
Fain, Bochkov and Mironov, 2000
: 62
, figs. 90–96 .

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material.
Holotype female at IRSNB ( 29041 ), paratypes : females, male, larvae at IRSNB . Hosts and distribution.
Brotogeris jugularis
( type host) ( Psittaciformes : Psittacidae ), type-locality: BRAZIL , Upper Amazonia (
Fain et al . 2000
).
Remark: This species was considered as incertae sedis in Skoracki ( 2011 b).

Type material.
Holotype female at AMU (SYR. 111 ), paratypes : females at AMU , ZISP . Hosts and distribution.
Aegithalos caudatus
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Aegithalidae ), type-locality: POLAND , Popielow near Opole (
Skoracki & Hebda 2004
); POLAND , Turawa lake (
Skoracki & Hebda 2004
). Habitat. Body feathers.

Type material.
Holotype female at AMU (SYR. 286 ), paratype : female at AMU . Hosts and distribution.
Cettia cetti
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Cettiidae ), type-locality: TURKEY , Aras (Skoracki 2011 b).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
chloris
Bochkov, Mironov and Kravtsova, 2000
: 352
, figs. 1–10 .
Type material.
Holotype female at ZISP (T-Sy- 14 ), paratypes : female, males at ZISP . Hosts and distribution.
Chloris chloris
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Fringillidae ), type-locality: KIRGHIZIA , Bishkek (Bochkov et al. 2000 ).

cichladusa
Skoracki, Solarczyk and Sikora, 2012
: 124
, figs. 1–9 .

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material.
Holotype female at ZSM ( ZSM
20112002
), paratypes : females, males, nymphs at ZSM , AMU . Hosts and distribution.
Cichladusa arquata
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Muscicapidae ), type-locality: TANZANIA , Soga (
Skoracki et al. 2012 d
).

cissa Skoracki, Bochkov and Wauhty, 2004 : 168
, figs. 37–43 .

Type material.
Holotype female at IRSNB (S-69.1.1.), paratypes : females at IRSNB , ZISP . Hosts and distribution.
Cissa chinensis
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Corvidae ), type-locality: NORTH INDOCHINA (
Skoracki et al. 2004 d
).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
corcoracus
Skoracki, Glowska and Sikora, 2008
: 64
, figs. 20–27 .
Type material.
Holotype female at AMU (Syr. 123 ).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Hosts and distribution.
Corcorax melanorhamphos
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Corcoracidae ), type-locality: AUSTRALIA (Skoracki et al. 2008 ).

Type material.
Holotype female at AMU , paratypes : females, male at AMU . Hosts and distribution.
Dinemellia dinemelli
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Ploceidae ), type-locality: TANZANIA (
Glowska & Skoracki 2011 b
).

dryobatis (
Fritsch, 1958
)
,
Syringophilus dryobatis
Fritsch, 1958
: 242
, fig. 10 ;
Picobia dryobatis ,
Kethley 1970
: 65
.
Type material.
Neotype female at AMU (S-65.1.1), female paraneotypes at AMU (designated in Skoracki et al . 2004 ).

Remark: Specimens from
Sturnus vulgaris
determined as
P. dryobatis (
Bochkov & Mironov 1998
)
belong to
Picobia sturni
(
Skoracki et al . 2004 d
).

dziabaszewskii Glowska, Dragun-Damian and Dabert, 2012 : 59
, figs. 1–7 .

Type material.
Holotype female at AMU , paratypes : females at AMU .

GenBank Accession no.: JQ043358 , JQ043359 ( COI ) and JQ043352 , JQ043353 , JQ043354 , JQ043355 , JQ043356 , JQ043357 (D 2 ) for
2 specimens
, voucher no. EG 552 , EG 554 .

echo
Skoracki, Solarczyk and Sikora, 2012
: 126 , figs. 10–21 .
Type material.
Holotype female at ZSM ( ZSM
20112010
), paratypes : females, males, nymphs, larva at ZSM , AMU .

Hosts and distribution.
Cossypha heuglini
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Muscicapidae ), type-locality: CONGO , South Kivu Prov., Bukavu (
Skoracki et al. 2012 d
).

Type material.
Holotype female at AMU (Syr. 273 ), paratypes : females, male at AMU . Hosts and distribution.
Eremophila bilopha
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Alaudidae ), type-locality: EGYPT (Skoracki 2011 b).

Type material.
Holotype female at AMU (SYR. 269 ).

Hosts and distribution.
Galerida cristata
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Alaudidae ), type-locality: POLAND , Zachodniopomorskie, near Swinoujscie (Skoracki 2011 b).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
hylocichlae
Skoracki, Spicer and OConnor, 2014
: 105 , figs. 2, 3 .

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material.
Holotype at UMICH ( BMOC 85 -0329- 3 ), paratypes at UMICH , AMU , ZISP . Hosts and distribution.
Hylocichla mustelina
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Turdidae ), type-locality: USA , Michigan, Washtenaw Co., Webster Twp. (Skoracki et al. 2014 b)

Type material.
Holotype female at AMU (Syr. 427 / 1–8 ), paratypes : female, male at AMU , IPCAS , ZISP . Hosts and distribution.
Illadopsis rufipennis
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Pellorneidae ), type locality: KENYA , Kakamega, Buyangu, Udo’s campsite (Skoracki & Hromada 2013 ).

Type material.
Holotype female at AMU (Syr. 217 ), paratypes : females, males at AMU , ZISP . Hosts and distribution.
Aplonis panayensis
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Sturnidae ), type-locality: INDONESIA (
Skoracki and Glowska 2008 c
).

lamprotornis
Klimovičová, Skoracki, Wamiti and Hromada, 2014
.
Type material.
Holotype female at AMU (Syr. 462 ), paratypes : females at AMU . Hosts and distribution.
Lamprotornis superbus
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Sturnidae ), type locality: KENYA , Soysambu (
Klimovičová et al. 2014 b
).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
lemi
Skoracki, Glowska and Sikora, 2008
: 60
, figs. 1–12 .

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material.
Holotype female at AMU (Syr. 212 ), paratypes : female, males at AMU . Hosts and distribution.
Manucodia chalybatus
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Paradisaeidae ), type-locality: NEW
GUINEA
(Skoracki et al . 2008 );
Manucodia ater
( Paradisaeidae ), NEW
GUINEA
, ( AMU ) (Skoracki et al . 2008 ). Habitat. Unknown.

Type material.
Holotype female at AMU , paratypes : females and male at AMU , ZSM .

Hosts and distribution.
Picus mentalis
( type host) ( Piciformes : Picidae ), type locality: MALAYSIA , Malakka (Skoracki & Unsoeld 2014 );
Picus mentalis
( Picidae ), INDONESIA , Java, ( AMU ) (
Skoracki et al . 2014 d
).

Type material.
Holotype female at USNM , paratypes : females at AMU , USNM . Hosts and distribution.
Myiopagis gaimardii
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Tyrannidae ), type locality: GUYANA , Upper Takutu–Upper Essequibo , Upper Rewa River (Glowska & Milensky 2014 );
Elaenia ruficeps
( Tyrannidae ), GUYANA , Cuyuni-Mazaruni, Paruima, 19 km N, at Mt. Holitipu, ( AMU , USNM ) (Glowska & Milensky 2014 );
Myiopagis subplacens
( Tyrannidae ), PERU , Tumbes, El Caucho Biological Station ( AMU , USNM ) (Glowska & Milensky 2014 ).

myrmecocichla
Skoracki, Solarczyk and Sikora, 2012
: 132 , figs. 22–32 .
Type material.
Holotype female at ZSM ( ZSM
20112011
), paratypes : females, males, nymph at ZSM , AMU . Hosts and distribution.
Myrmecocichla arnotti
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Muscicapidae ), type-locality: TANZANIA (
Skoracki et al. 2012 d
).

Type material.
Holotype female at USNM , paratypes : females at AMU , USNM . Hosts and distribution.
Tolmomyias sulphurescens
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Tyrannidae ), type locality: GUYANA , Cuyuni-Mazaruni, Paruima, ca. 19 km N, at Mt. Holitipu (Glowska & Milensky 2014 ). Habitat. Body feathers.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
oritis
Skoracki, Antczak and Riegert, 2009
: 133
, figs. 15–25 .

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material.
Holotype female at AMU , paratypes : females at AMU , ZISP , MRAC .

Type material.
Holotype female at AMU , paratypes : females, males at AMU , ZISP . Hosts and distribution.
Acrocephalus paludicola
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Acrocephalidae ), type-locality: POLAND , Swinoujscie (
Skoracki & Kiljan 2002
).

Type material.
Holotype female at ZISP (AVB-011- 2908 -068), paratypes : female, male at ZISP , AMU . Hosts and distribution.
Passer domesticus
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Passeridae ), type locality: RUSSIA , Tula district, Suvorov (Skoracki & Sikora 2014 ).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
phoeniculi
Fain, Bochkov and Mironov, 2000
: 69
, figs. 110–117 .

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material.
Holotype at MRAC ( 187374 ), paratypes : females at MRAC , ZISP , IRSNB . Hosts and distribution.
Phoeniculus purpureus
( type host) ( Coraciiformes : Phoeniculidae ), type-locality: RWANDA (
Fain et al. 2000
);
Upupa epops africana
( Upupidae ), TANZANIA , ( AMU ) (Skoracki & Hromada 2013 ).

Type material.
Holotype at AMU , paratypes at AMU (SYR. 393 / 1–4 ). Hosts and distribution.
Phoenicurus moussieri
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Muscicapidae ), type locality: TUNISIA (Skoracki & Hromada 2013 ).
Remark: This species was considered as incertae sedis in Skoracki 2011 b.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
ploceus
Klimovičová, Skoracki, Wamiti and Hromada, 2014
: 395
, figs. 1, 2 .
Type material.
Holotype at AMU , paratypes : females at AMU (SYR. 607 ). Hosts and distribution.
Ploceus ocularis
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Ploceidae ), type locality: KENYA , Soysambu Conservancy (
Klimovičová et al. 2014 b
).

subSubSection.paragraph:
psaltriparus Skoracki, Hendricks and Spicer, 2010 : 738
, figs. 44–55 .
Type material.
Holotype at NMNH , paratypes : females at NMNH , AMU . Hosts and distribution.
Psaltriparus minimus
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Aegithalidae ), type-locality: USA , Texas, Jeff Davis Co. (
Skoracki et al. 2010 c
).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
pycnonoti
Glowska, Skoracki and Khourly, 2007
: 64
, figs. 1–7 .

ramphastos
Fain, Bochkov and Mironov, 2000
: 33
, figs. 97–102 .
Type material.
Holotype female at IRSNB ( 29042 ), paratypes : females at IRSNB , ZISP . Hosts and distribution.
Ramphastos sulfuratus
( type host) ( Piciformes : Ramphastidae ), type-locality: GUATEMALA (
Fain et al . 2000
).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material.
Holotype female at AMU (Syr. 211 ), paratypes : females, males at AMU .

Hosts and distribution.
Riparia riparia
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Hirundinidae ), type-locality: POLAND , Lubuskie, Zielona Gora (Skoracki 2011 b).

Type material.
Holotype female at USNM , paratypes : females at USNM , AMU . Hosts and distribution.
Sayornis nigricans
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Tyrannidae ), type-locality: PERU , Tumbes, El Caucho Biological Station (Glowska 2014 ).

Type material.
Holotype female at USNM , paratypes : females at AMU , USNM . Hosts and distribution.
Lophotriccus pileatus
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Tyrannidae ), type locality: PERU , Tumbes, El Caucho Biological Station (Glowska & Milensky 2014 );
Hemitriccus margaritaceiventer
( Tyrannidae ), GUYANA , Cuyuni–Mazaruni, Paruima, ca. 19 km N, at Mt. Holitipu, ( AMU , USNM ) (Glowska & Milensky 2014 ).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
sturni
Skoracki, Bochkov and Wauthy, 2004
: 159
, figs. 8–20 .

subSubSection.paragraph:
troglodytidus Sikora and Skoracki, 2012
, Sikora et al. 2012 : 62 , figs. 11–19 .
Type material.
Holotype female at AMU (Syr. 351 ), paratypes : females at AMU , ZISP , ZSM . Hosts and distribution.
Henicorhina leucophrys
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Troglodytidae ), type-locality: COSTA RICA , Cartago (Skoracki et al. 2012 ).
